item.title: Rowing reaps the rewards at BUCS Regatta
item.author: Wilf Kimberley,
item.description: IC once again brought home the bacon at BUCS regatta, capturing the Men’s Victor Ludorum and finishing 2nd in the medals table over the three days and finishing with the most BUCS points of any university in the country (again) despite the absence of big lad Henry ‘gully’ Gooder and token chopper …
